ygData.subject: Re: Tailoring
ygData.msgSnippet: What about the brutes in Warsliks Woods? From what I have seen on the Atlas they are a bit lower level than FM. Anyone familiar with the brutes in this area?
ygData.messageBody:
What about the brutes in Warsliks Woods? From what I have seen on the
Atlas they are a bit lower level than FM. Anyone familiar with the
brutes in this area?

Barto

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Thomas H. Comegys" <comegys@p...> wrote:
> Su,
>
> You offer good advice, but I have to add a warning about the
Frontier
> Mountains zone. You mentioned having Camouflage memmed, which,
while a good
> idea while travelling in any dangerous zone, can lull you into a
false sense
> of security in FM (Dreadlands too). I say that because the Mountain
Giants
> are not fooled by Camo, or Invis -- they see right through it, and
would not
> be a good chance meeting for a level 29 druid travelling alone. I
think some
> of the Goblin Casters and perhaps the Burynai Cenobites can also
see through
> Camo/Invis.
>
> Froondor, Wood Elf Druid of 41 seasons
> Tarew Marr
